paper_title: Uncertainty-aware phase prediction of RMPEAs via mixture density networks

claims.claim: Using an acquisition size of 50 for active learning results in limited improvement. After five cycles, only 66% of the 50 samples that the active-learning approach identified as BCC Ti-alloys are actually BCC.
instruction: The code loads the MDN model obtained after five active-learning cycles with an acquisition size of 50, performs the selection step to generate 50 candidate BCC samples for the next cycle, and computes the accuracy of those 50 predictions
Confirm that the reported accuracy is 0.66
